title: Strictly Come Dancing week 5 - who danced it best? A breakthrough for Alex Scott, whilst Michelle Visage and Will Bayley expressed their emotions
text:
Following last week’s overinflated quickstep scores, David James came crashing down to earth with a dismal jive. Taking big, heavy steps meant he was always behind the beat, and he failed to disguise numerous mistakes.

Dance-off mate Mike Bushell didn’t fare much better. He pandered to guest judge Alfonso Ribeiro by awkwardly re-creating his Fresh Prince of Bel-Air novelty dance. It was a terrible music choice for samba, exacerbating Bushell’s stilted timing, absent hip action and strange posture – bottom out and legs bowed like a cowboy.

Viewers might well have questioned the wisdom of eliminating Dev Griffin ahead of those two – or Emma Weymouth, who the judges saved in their dance-off. She...
description: Following last week’s overinflated quickstep scores, David James came crashing down to earth with a dismal jive.
